Method Summary
static int getBlocksLanguageVersion(Element langDefRoot)
          Returns the lang-version attribute that was specified in the root node (BlockLangDef) of ya_lang_def.xml; 0 if there was no lang-version.
static int getComponentVersion(String componentGenus)
          Returns the LangSpecProperty component-version that was specified in ya_lang_def.xml for the BlockGenus with the given componentName; 0 if there was no component-version.

          Returns the ya-version attribute that was specified in the root node (BlockLangDef) of ya_lang_def.xml; 0 if there was no ya-version.

          Loads the language definitions from the given InputStream and returns the root DOM Element.

          Loads block connector shapes, block colors, block genuses, and block rules from the given langDefRoot.

          Creates a DocumentBuilder that uses our DTDResolver.

populateComponentMap

public static void populateComponentMap(HashMap<String,ArrayList<RenderableBlock>> componentMap,
                                        Map<Block,String> warnings,
                                        List<String> errors,
                                        boolean forRepl,
                                        boolean compileUnattachedBlocks,
                                        ComponentBlockManager cbm)
Builds a map of components -> top level blocks for that component. A special entry for GLOBALS maps to top-level global definitions.

Parameters:
componentMap - the HashMap to populate with components and their top level blocks
warnings - a Map that will be filled with warnings for troublesome blocks
errors - a list that will be filled with error messages
forRepl - whether this is executed for REPL
compileUnattachedBlocks - whether to compile unattached blocks
cbm - the component block manager
